p.d: Jonas Schneiter, journalist, and Marc Muller, ecologist, head off for a tour of French-speaking Switzerland in a solar-powered electric bus they've recycled and modified. Each day sees a positive new initiative. The perfect opportunity to raise awareness about the way Switzerland is moving towards sustainable development, a particularly topical subject. Presented by: Jonas Schneiter, Marc Muller. Directed by: Jérôme Piguet (season 3, Switzerland, 2019)
